title: Reciprocal Public License 1.5 (RPL-1.5)
description: A GPL-style license with very detailed liability protection and numerous requirements, created to close a perceived loophole in the GPL which let users sell modified software without 'fairly' distributing it. Disputes over this license must be settled through an American arbitration process.
